attributes.action: reinstate the 10p starting rate for tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lowest paid workers in the Country need help and support to ensure that they have a quality of life commesurate with those who have the ability to earn more.  Soceity needs to recognise the good work that low paid workers undertake rather than penalise them via paychecks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
